channel.title: Nautilus on Pierre Aronnax
channel.description: Recent content in Nautilus on Pierre Aronnax

item.title: Nautilus and What is it about
item.description: Nautilus is a pioneering decentralized framework for developing dApps that utilize post-quantum cryptography (PQC) for security.

item.title: Why Does This Matter?
item.description: Nautilus empowers developers to build a new generation of decentralized applications with post-quantum security.

item.title: Why Choose Nautilus?
item.description: Nautilus is the first decentralized framework designed with post-quantum security, modular extensibility, and seamless interoperability.

item.title: Nautilus Releases
item.description: This section provides detailed release notes, version history, and code documentation for Nautilus.
